name: [Digital] - Rule 1
desc: High amount transaction to risky country

name: [Digital] - Rule 2
desc: Rule that prevents sending money to denylisted accounts.

name: [Digital] - Rule 3
[Digital] - Rule 4
desc: Same Beneficiary getting multiple funds transfers from IB and/or MB

name: [Digital] - Rule 5
desc: New IP address, used to access IB/MB of an existing IB/MB customer, new beneficiary added and immediate fund transfer done
